Description:
[The Role and Responsibilities]Maintain financial books and records of client in accordance with IFRS
Managing journal entries in accounting software (e.g. Quickbooks, ZOHO)
Preparation of monthly / quarterly reporting packages and annual financial statements
Maintains accounting controls by preparing and recommending policies and procedures
Preparation of Audit Reports annually and/or Half Year reviews on financial statements
VAT Return Filings and VAT Refund Claims
Tax Invoice reviews
Research (Tax / Accounting / Finance News)
First contact person for clients / auditorsSkills
Skills:
Required level of education: Bachelor in Accounting
Years of relevant experiences: Minimum 3 years (Accounting, Auditing and/or Tax)
Qualification: CPA, ACCA, AICPA or any other equivalent certificate hereto.
Level of knowledge IFRS: Moderate to High
Language proficiency
Fluent English (especially in speaking and writing);
Good knowledge of Arabic is a plus
A female employee between the age of 25 ~ 35 is preferred

Computer literacy – Excel / Word / Power Point / Outlook (MS Office)
Experiences of accounting software, such as Quick-books and/or Zoho
Experiences as a Tax Accountant, Tax Analyst, or Tax Preparer
Being able to drive oneself would be an added value
Can join immediately or on short notice (within 1 month)
Flexibility and adaptability, sensitiveness to data accuracy
Team player with a positive ‘can do’ attitude
